Reviews.Title: Excelent and very cheap
Reviews.Author: Alfonso
Reviews.Content: The price is too low for many options you have the camera, excellent, highly recommended for amateur users. The zoom is very good, the only bad thing is that it takes too long to take pictures with flash.

ProductInfo.Features:
Exceptional 24X optical zooms lens allows you to captures distant objects in brilliant, close-up detail
18 scene modes to ensure you get the best picture possible
Fantastic low light performance
Easy-to-use interface combines the mode select wheel and icons for camera setup
